What's in the app?

Send a shipment - Between us
No more paperwork, forms or printing labels. With our mobile application, in which you can find the Between us service, you can send a shipment in a moment. All you need is a phone and an online payment. You can pay online with card or via Apple Pay.

Returning the shipment
Do you need to return a shipment to the e-shop? No problem. The application enables a simple return of the shipment, you only need to enter the code that you received from the e-shop. You don't need to fill in anything else.

Tracking
Thanks to the detailed tracking of the shipment and the connection with our system, you will know exactly where the shipment is located.

Push Notifications
Be informed. The app will notify you immediately when the shipment is ready for pickup.

Delivery points
Thanks to the interactive map, you can search for the nearest delivery points in the area. At the same time, the built-in filter allows you to select those places where you can pay by card, for example. Shipment archive
In the shipment archive, you can view all your shipments that have ever been paired with your account.

- Matematyka nie kłamie, ale są jeszcze inne sposoby na zebranie ekstra PUNKTÓW, które wymienisz na KUPONY. Wystarczy, że na bieżąco będziesz zerkać do appki, gdzie czekać będą ZADANIA specjalne.
- Podczas zakupów, zeskanuj cyfrową kartę SizeerClub, którą masz w aplikacji, a PUNKTY naliczą się same – zobaczysz to od razu, zerkając na stan konta w appce.

Odkrywaj przywileje, które czekają na Ciebie:
- Dostajesz dostęp do unikalnych i spersonalizowanych ofert zakupowych. Kiedy poznamy Twoje ulubione marki i zakupione produkty, będziemy wiedzieć, jakie propozycje mogą Cię zainteresować.
- Skorzystasz z okazji dostępnych tylko w aplikacji, bo najlepsze rabaty i promocje są tylko dla Klubowiczów. Dodatkowo, otrzymując powiadomienia będziesz mieć pewność, że żadna premiera nowego modelu sneakersów Cię nie ominie.
- W udanych zakupach pomoże wirtualna przymierzalnia, w której sprawdzisz na własnej stopie wybrane modele sneakersów i to gdziekolwiek jesteś.
- W jednym miejscu i to za jednym kliknięciem, będziesz mieć dostęp do historii zakupów. W ten sposób Twój paragon będzie zawsze pod ręką, a wydatki pod kontrolą.
- Zlokalizuj najbliższy salon Sizeer w Twojej okolicy, a aplikacja podpowie Ci, jakie są jego godziny otwarcia. Jeśli wybierzesz swój ulubiony salon, to podpowiemy Ci jakie aktualne promocje czekają na miejscu.
Ale to nie wszystko!
Kolejne aktualizacje, będą wzbogacać aplikacje Sizeer o kolejne funkcje, które sprawią, że zakup nowych sneakersów będzie jeszcze przyjemniejszy.

Whether you’re shopping for sportswear or the latest street styles, with new and exclusive trainers and clothing dropping daily, the JD Sports app has got you covered! With must-cop sneakers, shoes, clothes and accessories, the JD app brings the biggest brands in the game direct to your fingertips.

Shop the latest trainers in men's, women's and kids' sizes from Nike, adidas, Jordan, Converse and more, including loads of JD exclusive styles! With fresh additions to Nike’s Air Max, Air Force 1 and VaporMax fams, the latest adidas Originals including Ozweego, Gazelle and Superstar styles, and trainer icons like Air Jordan, Yeezy and Vans’ Old Skool dropping daily, you can lace up in the latest styles and colourways as often as you wish.

The JD app is also packed with new in freshness to keep you ahead of the latest trends. With T-shirts, hoodies, joggers, shorts, jackets and more, you can get a new look for the streets by shopping your favourite brands like The North Face, BOSS, EA7, Gym King, Jameson Carter, PUMA, Under Armour and SikSilk.

Looking to shop sports? Whether you’re running in the latest adidas Ultraboost, training in Nike or taking to the pitch in this season’s football boots, kits and replica shirts, we’ve got all the essentials in the locker to take your performance up a level.

JDX UNLIMITED DELIVERY
Refresh your rotation as much as you wish with our JDX Unlimited Membership service. For just £9.99, grab yourself unlimited UK Next Day Delivery for an entire year, early access to our Black Friday, Christmas and summer sales, plus loads of other exclusive perks!

INSTANT NEWS AND SALES UPDATES
Be the first to know about sales, delivery offers and more! Turn on those notifications and get personal shopping updates sent straight to you when you need them.

THE ULTIMATE GIFT CARD & eGIFT CARD!
Send your family and friends a JD gift card via post, email or text! You can choose instant delivery or select the day you’d like it to be delivered. Perfect if you’ve left it last minute!

MORE WAYS TO PAY
Shopping has never been easier than with our new payment options! With Apple Pay, PayPal, Klarna, Clearpay and many more – you can choose payment method that suits you. From paying next month to checking out with speed, we’ve got you covered.

DELIVERED HOW AND WHERE YOU WANT
With delivery to over 197 countries and click & collect available in over 600 stores, you can get your latest trainers, shoes, clothes and accessories in a way to suit you.

LIVE SEARCH
Don’t miss out on what’s trending! Type in what you’re looking for and Live Search will automatically drop down a list of related search queries which are trending right now.

QUICK REFINE
Quick refine top searches and find a new look to suit your style! Browse exactly what you want to see and filter down by size, brand, colour, collection or price.

360 TRAINER SPINS AND PRODUCT VIDEOS
Get up close and personal with your next cop. Our 360-trainer view lets you take a look at trainers from every angle. Plus, see what our sneakers look like straight out of the box with our HD product videos.

PRODUCT PERSONALISATION
Customise your style by getting your gear personalised. Whether you choose to finish up your new look with a custom cap or bag, or add a name to your football shirt or boots, make them your own in the JD app.

CREATE AND SHARE YOUR WISHLIST
Need the latest trainers from Nike or adidas, but can’t shop ‘til payday? Simply save items to your wishlist for quick access later. Or share your wishlist to drop a gift hint for Christmas or your birthday.

FIND YOUR LOCAL JD
We’ve refined our store finder to make things easier. Track down your closest store with interactive maps or scroll through our A-Z list.

STREAMLINED MY ACCOUNT
Make shopping easy and fly through checkout! Change and add addresses, save payment info, track your order, view previous shops and create multiple wishlists all in one place.

Here is what the HORNBACH app can do: 

Whether at home, on the job or directly in your HORNBACH store, our app is here to help, regardless of what project you have planned! In just a few clicks, you will find many features available to assist you in reaching one goal: supporting you in carrying out your project and purchases. 

Sleeves up, phone out. Here are the HORNBACH APP possibilities at a glance: 

Online shop: 24/7 shopping everywhere – simple and convenient.
● Huge product assortment for browsing, searching and finding.
● Order articles online or reserve them at the store for later pick up.

Store information: News about your store.
● Find local HORNBACH stores and set your default store.
● View information on individual stores including services, address, opening hours and products in stock.
● Receive information on current in-store events.

Project knowledge: Support for your project.
● Be inspired with new project ideas
● Find instructions that show you how to implement your ideas, step-by-step. 
● And to top it off, you get the right materials and tips for your project! 
● Articles that give you concentrated and compact information. 


Scanner: Direct access to product and project information.
● At home, on the job or at the store shelf: Scan the barcodes on articles and promptly see article details in the online shop and whether it's immediately available in the store.
● Scan QR codes for helpful tips, project videos and instructions.

What's New
● New scan button on the start page: access all scanning features with just one press. Whether article info, self-scan, image recognition or e-voucher logging. All these functions can now be easily accessed in one place on the start page. This means that you can get to the important information about our inventory and products even faster.

Ušetřete vždy nejvíc s aplikací Můj Albert a přidejte se k více než 1 milionu spokojených uživatelů.

Díky exkluzivním akcím pouze s aplikací získáte oblíbené produkty za ještě lepší ceny. Vedle toho vás za každý nákup odměníme kredity a až budete chtít, jednoduše je vyměníte za slevu na cokoliv.

Hledáte inspiraci pro vaření? Tisíce oblíbených receptů z našeho Albert Magazínu máte vždy po ruce a to doslova na klik.

K tomu všemu získáte nejrychlejší přístup k aktuálnímu letáku a všem svým účtenkám v přehledné elektronické podobě. A navíc ušetříte přírodu.

Více informací na Albert.cz/aplikace

AAA AUTO vám přináší největší nabídku ojetých vozů k prodeji přímo do telefonu. Tato aplikace vás zavede mezi až 10 000 vozů, ze kterých si můžete vybrat.
 
Rychlý a snadný přístup k úplnému popisu každého vozidla a procházení rozsáhlé galerie obrázků pro detailní prohlídku jakéhokoli vozidla.
 
Aplikace představuje nejlepší nástroj pro výběr ojetého vozidla z největšího výběru na trhu. Pokud prodáváte auto, získejte rychlý a realistický odhad ceny.
 
Klíčové vlastnosti aplikace:
- Trhy - Česká republika, Slovensko a Polsko
- Různé přehledné kategorie
- Filtry pro pokročilé vyhledávání
- Podrobné informace o každém vozidle
- Rozsáhlé galerie obrázků
- Přehled speciálních nabídek, slev a bonusů
- Jednoduchá nezávazná rezervace vozu
- Leasingová kalkulačka
- Hodnocení vozu
- Kontakty na naše pobočky

Prichádzame s novou aplikáciou pre všetkých, ktorým sú ich knižné poličky už primalé! 


MÁTE DOMA KNIHY, KTORÉ NEČÍTATE? 
Máte na poličke knihu, ktorú už nebudete čítať? Stačí namieriť fotoaparát na knihu a ihneď sa dozviete, či ju môžete posunúť ďalej a koľko vám za ňu vyplatíme. 

- Stačí odfotiť čiarový kód knihy alebo napísať jej názov 
- Ihneď sa dozviete sumu, za ktorú ju od vás vykúpime 

NOVÉ KNIHY UŽ NA VÁS ČAKAJÚ 
Posuňte knihy ďalej a získajte poukážky na nové. Po potvrdení výkupu knihy zabalíte, donesiete do kníhkupectva alebo pošlete cez Packetu, či kuriéra a už o pár dní sa vo vašom konte objaví poukážka na ďalšie knihy. 

- Jednoduchý postup 
- Nové knihy môžete mať doma už o pár dní 

NEVYKUPUJEME PRÁVE, TO ČO CHCETE? KNIŽNÁ SOVA DÁ VEDIEŤ, KEĎ BUDEME 
Oskenujte celú vašu knižnicu a vďaka funkcii Knižná sova si môžete do zoznamu odložiť aj knihy, ktoré práve nevykupujeme. Keď začneme, dozviete sa o tom prostredníctvom našej aplikácie a knihy môžete pohodlne rovno presunúť do výkupného košíka.

The size? launches app gives you a fair chance of getting your hands on the most coveted releases each and every week. And the best part is it’s really easy to enter.                                                                                  
                                                                                               
To get yourself in the running, simply:                                                                                        
                                                                                                
• Download our ‘size? launches’ app.  
• Log in with your existing size? account (don’t have one? Sign up on the app)                                                                                          
• Select the launch product you’re after.                                                                                      
• Select your size.                                                                                             
• Confirm those payment details.                                                                                                
• Submit your entry.                                                                                           
                                                                                                
And that’s it – we told you it was easy!                                                                                       
                                                                                                
Once the draw has finished, we will swiftly inform you of the result – win or lose. If you’re one of the lucky ones, we will take care of the rest. This includes processing your order and endeavoring to get your product sent to your chosen address on the very same day – which is always nice.                                                                                          
                                                                                                
It’s also worth noting that we pre-authorise your card details & subsequently hold the money until after the draw closes. If you’re successful, your payment will be taken at the close of the draw. If you’re unsuccessful, your funds will be returned into your account within 3 to 5 days. If you’re wondering why we do this, it’s to make the transaction process much smoother and quicker on launch day.
